mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.InvalidFieldException
mdException.message: The field [{field}] cannot be exported to DHIS2 at this time.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.DHIS2NameLengthException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Name Length Exception
mdException.message: The name [{name}] is too long. DHIS2 does not support names longer than {charLen} characters.
